ViewingTool.WindowArea: Click and drag to zoom into area defined by the rectangle.
ViewingTool.Rotate: Click and drag to move view around rotation point. Change rotation point by moving crosshair.
ViewingTool.RotateDrag: Click and drag to move view around rotation point.
ViewingTool.Look: Click and drag to look around.
ViewingTool.Pan: Click and drag to pan view.
ViewingTool.Navigate: Click and drag to navigate view. Hold Shift to change elevation. Hold Ctrl to look around.

Error.NotSuportedElmType: Element type not valid for this tool
Error.ProjectExtents: Invalid location. All elements must fit within the volume defined by the project extents.

ElementUndo.UndoAll: Do you really want to UNDO ALL CHANGES?

ElementLocate.MSG2: Element is in a model with locate turned off
ElementLocate.MSG9: Element type not valid for this tool
ElementLocate.MSG10: Element properties not valid for this tool
ElementLocate.MSG12: Element is in a model that is not allowed by this tool
ElementLocate.MSG22: Element does not allow this operation

Error.NoArea: Difference results in zero area region
Error.NotClosed: Element is not closed, can't be used

Prompt.PointReset: Enter point or RESET to complete
